name: Ghostbusters (itch)
description:
Controls

MoveWASDPull BoxesSpaceAim and Shoot in cardinal directionsMouse

Navigate the dungeon and locate your stranded friends. Use boxes to open button-activated doors, find your friends to move heavier boxes, and escape the haunted dungeon.

Tip: As enemies get faster, try forcing them into a circular path, ghosts aren't very smart and will just orbit you.
